TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> event that occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> moves.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType scrollEventType, float64 newValue) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> movement that caused the event.
The value that corresponds to the new location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventArgs"> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType> enumeration value and the new location of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.param: The current object along the event's route.
Docs.summary: Performs the appropriate type casting to call the type-safe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventHandler"> delegate for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll> event.
Gets a value that represents the new location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
Docs.value: The value that corresponds to the new position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The new value corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> enumeration value that describes the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position that caused this event.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType"> enumeration value that describes the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> movement that caused the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll> event.
